Description:
An Arena Spectacular
Located in the sought after Arena Estate in Officer is this spectacular built one of a kind home. Within walking distance to everything you could possibly need you will fall in love with the active lifestyle the home will bring.
An abundance of living space is showcased with this very clever double story layout having a very versatile floorplan that will allow the large family to enjoy.
The home has 2 to 3 separate living zones including a separate theatre downstairs, large stone kitchen with huge island bench, dishwasher and walk in pantry.
The home features 4 or 5 bedrooms the master with full ensuite and double walk in robes while all other additional bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom and additional toilet. Car accommodation is taken care of with the double remote garage offering internal access. This home is low maintenance yet so spacious and presents extreme value to the current market. An inspection will impress as there are too many features and inclusions to list. Private inspections are allowed and are definitely welcomed.
Please call Matt Ketteringham 0412 930 177 and make this happen
Insights: 93 Arena Parade, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
What A Great Location!
With new schools, shops, public transport, parks and kilometres of walking tracks all nearby, this immaculate 4 bedroom home is perfect for any growing family. Two separate living zones provide flexible living inside, whilst your choice of 2 separate alfresco dining areas are perfect for outdoor entertaining. The 394m2 allotment also provides for the perfect amount of lawn. The master bedroom features an ensuite and walk in robe, and all other bedrooms have built in robes. Tasteful décor and a neutral colour scheme throughout provide warmth and appeal, and mod cons such as split system air conditioning, stone benched kitchen with dishwasher, and a remote double garage with internal access make the home comfortable all year round. The propertys low maintenance design will also appeal to investors, so whether buying to live in or rent out, this is a home you can Inspect with confidence.

Description:
MOVE IN & RELAX - YOUR NEW HOME AWAITS!
**OPEN FOR INSPECTION SATURDAY **
From its imposing street appeal, functional floor plan design and quality lux finishes throughout, this impressive Beechwood constructed home is an absolute stand out on every level and is sure to please the most astute buyer looking for complete perfection!
Four spacious bedrooms are on offer, master suite complete with large WIR, a stylishly appointed ensuite boasting an oversized shower, twin vanities with stone benches plus separate toilet.
There is no doubt the kitchen is the vocal point of the home and its here you find an array of quality features some of which include Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, oven & cooktop, glass mirror splash backs, waterfall stone bench top and huge walk in pantry - a kitchen fit for those who love to entertain!
Living zones are cleverly designed to please the entire family. The formal lounge room is located towards the front of the home offering a quiet place for all to enjoy. The casual family & meals room are large in size and overlook an array of glass stacker doors opening out to the covered alfresco area. Venturing outside we have beautifully manicured lawns & gardens providing a private yet spacious back yard suitable for larger families or those needing space for their four legged fur babies.
Additional standout features of the home also include:
3 x Split system A/C units - 2 in main living areas and 1 in master bed room
Ducted gas heating through out
Double glazed windows & Internal wall insulation
Bosh home security system + Video intercom door bell
Sheer curtains with block out blinds
High ceilings and doors
Solar Power
Double garage with internal access
Perfectly situated only a few hundred meters away from the new Timbertop Primary School which is expected to open in 2021, a short walk to Timbertop Cafe & only a short drive to St Brigid's Primary, St Francis Xavier College, Haileybury & Beaconhills College.
Presenting in as new condition this home is sure to impress and simply won't last. Be sure to book your private inspection TODAY!

Description:
Low Maintenance Living, In The Heart of Officer!
Perfectly priced to please your pocket, this is the ideal stepping stone for first home buyers to enter the property market, small families and astute investors. This low maintenance, practical home offers contemporary living in a brilliant central location where you can walk to the shops, schools and a train station.
This property is brimming with features, including:
• Three bedrooms, all with built in robes
• Master bedroom features a walk in wardrobe and ensuite
• Modern kitchen is dressed with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, oven, stovetop and pantry
• Open plan living and dining area flows out to the outdoor entertaining area
• Ducted heating and air conditioning unit will keep you comfortable all year round
• Main bathroom services the remaining bedrooms and includes a bathtub and separate toilet
• Separate laundry with built in cupboards and external access
• Outdoor decking flows into the backyard with lawn and a fruitful lemon tree
• Remote controlled single car garage
With all the necessary facilities and services nearby, this property will be a fantastic home or investment property. Within a 16 minute walk you will reach Cardinia Road Train Station and the Lakeside Square Shops. For parents, Bridgewood Primary School and Officer Secondary College are both within walking distance whilst St Francis Xavier College can be reached within a 5 minute drive. The Arena Shopping Centre and access to the Monash Freeway can easily be reached within a 2-3 minute drive.
*Check out our 3D Tour - http://gallantimagery.com.au/tours/26Turnbridge/*

Description:
Contemporary Timbertop Estate home with a Pool!
The striking contemporary façade of this superb family home gives you but a hint of what lies beyond. Inside, the totally modern finishes compliment the homes cleverly arranged separate living zones; versatile and ready to accommodate.
The stylish central kitchen features an On Trend design with 40mm waterfall Caesar stone benches an oversized WIP and high-end fixtures and fittings. This hub of the home flows to the expansive open living area which merges seamlessly via triple stacker doors to the stunning travertine tiled outdoor alfresco and luxurious solar heated pool.
The large rear garden is low maintenance, secure and private; perfect for the kids to play and the family pet. A fantastic entertainment focused property in a lovely quiet, leafy and safe neighborhood minutes from major urban facilities.

Description:
Corner The Market
As an established community, rich in public and private assets, a place of diversity and opportunity, Officer is becoming one of the most sought-after suburbs in the South-East Growth Corridor. Peake Real Estate proudly presents this corner commercial-zoned allotment divided into 2 half acre titles.
Situated right in the heart of one of the Officer Town Centre Sub-Precinct, within walking distance to Officer Train Station, surrounded by a choice of public and private schools, easy access to Officer township and Monash Freeway, these two flat allotments total area over 4000sqm sure will shine in the future Officer Town Centre development.
Thanks to the 2018 Planning Amendment C232Officer Town Centre Review (STCA), this property falls into Local Business Sub-Precincts, which
Provide development opportunities for small local businesses
Encourage uses that are compatible with existing industrial uses, but provide a transition to mixed-use in the longer term
Active uses at street level and residential and/or commercial uses on upper levels
Fine-grain development, especially close to train station
Pedestrian connections to and from Officer train station
Flexible / adaptable building design to enable transition of uses over time
Zero building set-backs / rear-loaded lots
Potential opportunities including Offices, medical centres, leisure and recreation uses (STCA) and some of the Key Planning and Design Guidelines :
Minimise street setbacks
Minimum of two storeys or equivalent height
Maximum setback of two metres from the street
Commercial development in Officer is on the rise, its time to secure your share in the market. Contact us today for a site inspection and more information.

Description:
Immaculate family home on 616m2!
Conveniently located in the Arcadia Estate Officer this gorgeous and low maintenance home is only moments away from Lakeside Square Shopping Centre, Arena Shopping Centre, Restaurants, Cardinia Road Train Station, Officer Primary School and easy freeway access.
Well-proportioned and filled with natural light, the inviting interior showcases four bedrooms, master bedroom with his and hers walk in robe and ensuite, two further bedrooms with built in robes and serviced by a family bathroom. The fourth bedroom is located to the front of the home along with a study nook.
At the heart of the home you will find a deluxe kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven and stove top, walk in pantry, dishwasher and large stone island countertop; flanked by two separate living zones and a family meals area that opens to a covered alfresco and large backyard allowing plenty of room for the kids to play!
Additional benefits include- ducted heating, floating floor boards, downlights throughout, double car garage with internal access and so much more.
This really is the complete package, so be quick to book your private inspection today as it won't be around for long!
INSPECTION PROCEDURE:
In light of the current COVID-19 situation, Open For Inspections are now permitted and limited to groups of 10 plus agency staff. Social distancing and hygiene procedures still apply. Hand sanitizer will be available at all inspections and there is to be no hand contact with surfaces within the property. Contact us to discuss any concerns you may have before arriving at the inspection.

Description:
QUALITY BUILT HOME IN TOP LOCATION
Situated in the fast growing Officer 3809 postcode, you can be assured of a smart investment and lifestyle.
Instantly you will love the lush gardens and timber stairs leading into the impressive façade. As you enter you will love the modern colour schemes and attention to detail that the current owners have achieved. To the left you will find the master bedroom with its own split system, WIR and full ensuite. Additional bedrooms include BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom complete with quality fixtures and fittings.
The floorplan flows out into the main living area and the contemporary kitchen that will impress any budding chef with stone benchtop, an abundance of cupboard space and stainless steel appliances.
Entertainers will love the sliding door access leading to the undercover alfresco and fully landscaped low maintenance backyard.
Added features include but not limited to roller door access from the double garage, security shutters on most of the windows on the home, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, laundry and much more.
Situated in close proximity to Officers New Town Centre, prestigious schools, Officer Train Station, local parks, playgrounds and Beaconsfield and Officer shops.
Call today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
SIMPLY PERFECT
Built by renowned SJD homes and finished to a high standard, the current owner ensured no expense was spared in this spectacular home.
The home gives a statement from the outset with a modern façade enhanced by tranquil landscaped gardens.
Tailored to give space for everyone, the floorplan is expansive and perfect for those who love to entertain.
At the front of home is the master bedroom featuring WIR and full ensuite as well as plantation shutters. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are both located at the rear of the home and include BIRs and ceiling fans and are serviced by the main bathroom which includes stone vanity, separate shower/bath and finished with quality fixtures and fittings.
The main living and dining area features soaring 12 foot ceilings and has an abundance of natural light coming in, overlooking this zone is the impressive kitchen with 40mm stone bench, dishwasher, pendant lighting, induction cooking and WIP.
You will be spoiled for choice with 2 separate living zones as well as the massive undercover alfresco that is ideal all year round with outdoor blinds, ceiling fan, outdoor heaters and surrounded by the beautiful gardens and backyard space.
Added features of the home include but are not limited to large laundry with WIL, powder room, security cameras, double garage, evaporative cooling, ducted heating and much more.
Located in the premier Arcadia Estate and situated just minutes from Officers Proposed New Town Centre, Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary College, Officer train station, local parks and walking tracks, you will be ensured of a top location for your family.
Only on inspection can you grasp the true beauty of this home.

Description:
Park Your Future Here!
Immaculately presented and extremely low maintenance is this approximately 5-year-old home where you could park your investment for the future.
Upon entry you are welcomed by an abundance of natural light drawing you into the home. The hall leads straight into the heart of the home where the open plan kitchen, meals and living zone is situated. The well-appointed kitchen is complete with quality appliances including, dishwasher and 600mm stove top & oven, ample cupboard storage and stone bench space.
Accommodating three bedrooms, the master offering a full ensuite, BIR & split system, the additional bedrooms are both of a good size featuring built-in robes and a built in wall heater, serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet.
Outdoors is extremely low maintenance from the front to back, so you will not find yourself trying to upkeep the gardens. Other features of this magnificent home include split system cooling and an awesome outdoor undercover living area which is private and spacious.
Positioned on approx. 318m2 and located in the newly established Park Central Estate in Officer where you will be close to all amenities such as schools, shops, public transport, and parks. Enquire to schedule a private viewing and secure this fantastic opportunity.

Description:
HOME SWEET HOME
This home will amaze from first glance with stunning façade, exposed aggregate concrete driveway and landscaped gardens including entry timber steps.
Rich in modern finishes, this residence is one that ticks all the boxes.
Entering the home gives you the instant wow factor with a wide entrance hall and high ceilings leading to the heart of the home. The stunning kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, glass splash back, stainless steel appliances, WIP and an abundance of cupboard space. When designing this home the owners had in mind to cater for large families, the floorplan flows effortlessly with 2 living areas with the main living/dining zone opening out to the rear deck and large undercover alfresco.
The oversized master bedroom features plantation shutters, WIR and full ensuite. Located in separate wing of the home is the bathroom as well as additional bedrooms which all include BIRs.
Added features include but are not limited to front study, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, laundry, storage space, and double remote controlled garage.
Located in the Park Central Estate, you will love the sense of community within the estate, with local BBQ area and a park with playground, and just minutes from to local schools, Officers new Proposed Town Centre, Officer Train Station, Arena and Beaconsfield Shops and much more.
If you are looking to capitalise on Officers growth or upsize to this wonderful family home, this home is a must to add to the inspection list.
Dont delay as this home will not last long

Description:
Unsurpassed Quality in Officer!
Located in the Potters Grove north estate this stunning Kialla Homes built property is ready for you to move in and enjoy, just three years young, no expense has been spared in creating the perfect home for the modern family.
From the moment you arrive and walk down the timber decking to the front door you'll be immediately impressed. Featuring three great sized bedrooms including master bedroom with ensuite with double vanity plus large walk in robe and split system air - conditioner. The remaining two bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom.
The home offers a front formal living zone and a rear open plan living integrating kitchen - dining - lounge into one. The kitchen is simply stunning with an abundance of cupboard space and stone benchtops with a large island stone bench being the centrepiece, added features include stainless steel appliances with oven, cooktop, rangehood and dishwasher, food storage and preparation is taken care of with a butler's pantry the cherry on top of a grand kitchen design.
Other internal features include ducted heating throughout, a split system air - conditioner in the rear living zone, study nook, internal laundry, quality floating floorboards, quality window coverings, internal access from the double car garage on remote plus quality fixtures and fittings throughout. Outside is a well-manicured garden and grassed area with timber decking and undercover zone, a gas outlet allows for easy BBQing all year round.
Situated in the heart of Officer you are in close proximity to St Brigid's Primary school, D' Angelo estate winery, Officer train station and easy access to the M1 Freeway. This wonderful home is sure to impress so call today to book your own private inspection.
Please note: The property is available to view by private inspection. Please contact the agent to organize a suitable time. The health and safety of our clients and staff is paramount and we are closely following the advice of the Australian Government and World Health Organisation.

Description:
Sophisticated class in a prime location
This near new luxury home presents a strong focus on style, scope and sophistication. Blending the latest in modern design with a free-flowing floorplan and a fresh white decor; the single storey layout presents open plan living at its finest. Towering ceilings with clear storey windows flood the main plan living area with light. The superbly appointed, designer kitchen hosting a partial butlers pantry, stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, glass splashback, two tone cabinetry, island breakfast bar and 900mm gas cooktop. A rumpus room at the rear of the property is ideal for a games room or retreat.
Glass sliding doors open to reveal a private courtyard with landscaped gardens intended for minimal maintenance and effortless entertaining. Boasting 4 double bedrooms; master suite features a huge walk in wardrobe and luxurious ensuite with double vanity and frameless shower, with the three secondary bedrooms all offering double robes, serviced by a centrally located bathroom and separate toilet.
Enhancing the property further is a remote double remote garage with internal entry, ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, laundry with cabinetry and downlights throughout. Turn the key into this near new low-maintenance lifestyle you've been looking for.
